meanings.definition: Inflammation of a bursa, typically causing pain and swelling.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her bursitises after examining her swollen knee.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often suffer from bursitises due to repetitive movements.
meanings.sent3: Carrying heavy bags all day can lead to bursitises, so lighten your load!
meanings.sent4: Her bursitises felt like tiny firecrackers going off in her joints.
meanings.sent5: The bursitises in his elbow made it feel like a balloon ready to burst.
